concepts.name: Organization
concepts.description: The top-level entity that contains all other data

concepts.name: User
concepts.description: A person who interacts with the system

concepts.name: Role
concepts.description: A named set of responsibilities and permissions

concepts.name: Function
concepts.description: An atomic unit of work or responsibility

concepts.name: Process
concepts.description: A series of steps to accomplish a goal

concepts.name: Goal
concepts.description: An objective with measurable key results

concepts.name: Resource
concepts.description: An asset or capability owned by the organization
